page.description: Returns true if the named xdialog is minimized.

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description:
Indicates whether the dialog box is minimized.
.T. = is minimized
.F. = is not minimized

argument.name: title
argument.description: The name of the dialog box.

page.discussion: The UI_DLG_IS_MINIMIZED() function indicates whether the specified modeless dialog is minimized.
